quotes.quote: Awakening is the purpose that enfolds all purposes.
The greater the doubt, the greater the awakening
Awakening your spiritual side is really what artists do. When you hit a groove, it's not you; it's the spirit world.
Healing is awakening to the perfection that already is ours.
If every day is an awakening, you will never grow old. You will just keep growing.
Spiritual Awakening is awakening from the dream of thought.
We are near awakening when we dream that we dream.
Enlightenment or awakening is not the creation of a new state of affairs but the recognition of what already is.
An awakening can happen in a flash. And in a flash, you are changed forever.
Even loss and betrayal can bring us awakening.
That higher awakening is called God-consciousness. In that condition, you will see that all the objects of the world are your own universal self.
A perfect method for awakening is to examine the results of our daily actions. If they are harmful, we know we need more consciousness.
Your greatest awakening comes, when you are aware about your infinite nature.
No great spiritual awakening has begun anywhere in the world apart from united prayer.
The path of awakening is not about becoming who you are. Rather it is about unbecoming who you are not.
Spiritual awakening - is becoming awake to the aliveness of this moment.
Awakening self-compassion is often the greatest challenge people face on the spiritual path.
The awakening of consciousness is the next evolutionary step for mankind.
Awakening into love is a lifelong path.
A single event can awaken within us a stranger totally unknown to us. To live is to be slowly born.
Only by awakening can you know the true meaning of that word.
Awakening is about liberating yourself from the prison that is the world of the mind and daring to be here as all that you are.
Awakening is not changing who you are, but discarding who you are not.
A religious awakening which does not awaken the sleeper to love has roused him in vain.
When we awaken to our truth, we realize we are free.
We are awakening from the dream of isolation, from the dream of loneliness, and it's a terrible shock.
This days one must be careful to avoid awakening the pain of another.
As awakening occurs, a powerful transformation takes place within you, and a new consciousness is born on earth.
Every reform means awakening. Once truly awakened, the nation will not be satisfied with reform only in one department of life.
Awakening is usually precipitated by the honest, sincere, inquiry into who you really are.
Imitation is the first instinct of the awakening mind.
Awakening begins when a man realizes that he is going nowhere and does not know where to go.
Awakening is dynamic, Constantly evolving in accordance with life's realities.
